\[Title: ] Reflectance and Transmittance Modules for an OL-750 Spectroradiometer
======================================================

### Tender Details

| Detail | Information |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | WS4127325595-Doc4127369167 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4127325595 |
| Amendment Number | 1 |
| Solicitation Status | Expiré (Expired) |

### Notice Information

| Detail | Information |
| --- | --- |
| Publication Date | August 1, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | August 16, 2023, at 14:00 EDT |
| Expected Contract Start Date | September 30, 2023 |
| Expected Contract End Date | March 31, 2024 |

### Vendor Information

| Detail | Information |
| --- | --- |
| Contracting Entity | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) |
| Contracting Entity Address | 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5 |
| Contact Information | Mohamed Shawky Elgallab (SPAC/PSPC) at mohamedshawky.elgallab@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca |

### Technical Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada requires the supply and delivery of Reflectance and Transmittance Modules for an OL-750 Spectroradiometer from Optronics Laboratories to expand the capabilities of the OL-750 Spectroradiometer. The new capabilities include:

*   Expanded range into the Far-Infrared (0.3-14.5um)
*   Diffuse reflectance
*   Normal transmittance measurements through specimen samples up to 2” x 2” in size.
Insert edit here as final edit.
